news.title: King Crimson's first album in over twenty years is in the works
news.summary: Guitarist Jakko Jakszyk has confirmed that the most recent King Crimson lineup – featuring himself, Robert Fripp, Mel Collins, Tony Levin, Pat Mastelotto, Gavin Harrison and Jeremy Stacey – has returned to the studio.

news.title: KNEECAP play sold-out Glasgow show after being dropped from TRNSMT headline
news.summary: "Buzzing to play one of our favourite cities for a show that sold out in seconds," they wrote last night.

news.title: Luvcat announces Academy Dublin gig and release of debut album Vicious Delicious
news.summary: The UK singer has released the title track of her debut record—'Vicious 'Delicious'—out today

news.title: Fergie releases new ‘London Bridge’ music video for new series Too Much
news.summary: Too Much will release tomorrow and the music video can be seen below.

news.title: Jape and Pillow Queens to play the National Concert Hall as part of Landmark Series
news.summary: They will perform on September 14 and October 21 respectively.

news.title: DROKK release remix of ØXN’s Cruel Mother
news.summary: The remix will be sold in a limited-edition 12-inch green vinyl, with all profits donated to War Child in support of children affected by global conflict, according to Claddagh Records.

news.title: Christy Moore releases video for spoken word tribute to President Michael D. Higgins, featuring 10ft portrait by ACHES
